title: Ancient Tomb of the Black Magus
story: After being destroyed by a devastating earthquake decades ago the tomb of the Black Magus remained abandoned. Recently a fearsome sphinx has made its lair here.

notes.text: A tapestry on the wall, puts a person to sleep when examined.
A mouth-shaped double door with a keyhole to the south.
Remains of an elf apparently killed by gnomes, lockpicks clutched in his hands.
A broken chest with a key.
